title: 243: Addressing the Chatty Bros Episode + MAJOR BIP Theories & News + More!
itunes:title: 243: Addressing the Chatty Bros Episode + MAJOR BIP Theories & News + More!
description:
The Broads are back and first they have a little random chat about Jess’ alopecia and Bekah’s famous pixie cut - THEN they dive into a discussion about some of the controversy surrounding the latest Chatty Bros’ episode with Grayston and Evan, scenarios about starting podcasts with their “enemies”, Bachelor Nation news involving Bennett’s latest Kelly pursuit efforts and some big theories about his game, some major news about Katie season and a contestant (potential SPOILER if avoiding all Katie Bachelorette news - conversations goes from approx 01:00:00 - 01:19:00), and BIP cast announcements and information and a whole lot of theories! 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***THIRD LOVE: Go to THIRDLOVE.COM/CHATTY now to get 20% off your first purchase!

***CARE/OF: For 50% off your first Care/of order, go to TAKECAREOF.COM/ CHATTY50 and enter code CHATTY50

***NATIVE: Go to NATIVEDEO.COM/CHATTY or use promo code CHATTY at checkout and get $25 off your first order!

***FRAMEBRIDGE: Go to FRAMEBIDGE.COM and use promo code CHATTY to save an additional 15% off your first order!

 

FOLLOW CHATTY BROADS:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/chattybroads/

Bekah: https://www.instagram.com/bekah/

Jess: https://www.instagram.com/thebaddmom/

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzx2N1qxFObhvSvf9tp7ayQ

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
